channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Ransom Buster, Trend Micro Security (Consumer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Ransom Buster, Trend Micro Security (Consumer)

item.title: CVE-2019-14686|2024-08-05T00:26:37.472Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20ransom%20buster%2C%20trend%20micro%20security%20%28consumer%29
item.description: A DLL hijacking vulnerability exists in the Trend Micro Security's 2019 consumer family of products (v15) Folder Shield component and the standalone Trend Micro Ransom Buster (1.0) tool in which, if exploited, would allow an attacker to load a malicious DLL, leading to elevated privileges.
